name: About Us
description: princeofcookies.tech (“we”, “our”) respects your privacy. This policy explains what data we collect, why, how we use it, who can access it, and your rights under applicable laws.

name: What Data We Collect & How
description:
• Automatically Collected: IP address, user agent, page route, and time of access.
  • Host collection: Data collected by our hosting provider, includes, but is not limited to, IP Address, user agent, and time of access. To read more on what they collect, read their Privacy Policy.

name: Purposes & Legal Basis
description:
• Security: Detect abuse, ensure service integrity
  • General Analytics: Most visited pages, user interactions, etc.
  • Operations: Run backend services and log usage
extra: Under GDPR, processing is based on legitimate interests necessary for the functioning and security of the service. Under CCPA: usage is limited to service analytics.

name: Data Retention
description: Data is retained as long as necessary for security, operations, or legal compliance, and may be deleted upon valid request as permitted by law.

name: Who Can Access Your Data
description: • Hosting Provider: Data is stored with Novonode, which has technical access for server operations and security. See their Privacy Policy.
extra: No other third parties have access to your data. We do not sell, rent, or share it externally.

name: Children's Privacy
description: This site is not intended for individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe a child has provided us data, contact us immediately.

name: Your Rights (GDPR / CCPA)
description: For more information on your rights under GDPR or CCPA, visit the official sources.
extra: To exercise these rights, email legal@princeofcookies.tech with enough information to verify your identity.

name: Changes to This Policy
description: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically. Each update will have a new effective date. Continued use of this site means you agree to the updated terms.

name: Contact & Dispute Resolution
description: For questions, requests, or complaints, contact us at legal@princeofcookies.tech. If unresolved, you may contact your data protection authority (e.g., EU DPA, CCPA authority).

name: Governing Law
description: We follow GDPR for EU users and CCPA for California Residents. This policy is governed under the law of Canada (Novonode's jurisdiction) and other relevant regions.
